entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
